00049 /**
00050  * @brief Class for computing hilo qc metric from a cel set of cel files.
00051  */

00078    * Get the names for the pair of cel files that have been seen.
00079    * @return - vector of cel file names, one for each cel file in order seen.
00080    */
00081   std::vector<std::string> getCelNames() {
00082     return m_CelNames;
00083   }
